extension.name: Content - Global Variables
extension.author: Lars Echterhoff
extension.description:
Please check your plugin page if this plugin is activated: Click here

This plugin gives you the possibility to define often reused text fragments and reuse it in every content as variable.

Further information on: https://github.com/echterhoff/plg-globalvariables

field.name: variabledefinition
field.label: Give some variables
field.description: Defining variables is quite simple. I assume you found this plugin while searching for globals or variables or kind of. So defining variables is as easy as writing an ini-File. Give a variable followed by a equal sign (=) and the value. Close the definition with a semicolo (;). If you would like to define a more complex value, surround the value with ('). Thats it.

field.name: variablesource
field.label: Article ID
field.description: Give an article ID that holds the variable definition
